bibliography.title: Perturbation-allowed rotational transitions and A(1)-A(2) splitting transitions in the ground, v(2)=1 and v(4)=1 vibrational states of SbH3 observed by microwave Fourier transform spectroscopy: Extension of the effective hyperfine Hamiltonian
